name: Space Wars (itch) (Hoff's Son)
description:
Use skill to shoot down your enemies. Avoid asteroids and navigate the near endless void of space. Beware of your quite limited lives.  Make sure to utilize resources.

One playthrough will never be the same as another through the randomly spawned enemies. Try to beat your high score each time as the level is near endless. If you encounter a bug, let me know as I will fix it right away. Thanks for playing and have fun.
